top_stories.title: Prowler Launches Lighthouse AI and MCP Server
top_stories.description: Prowler’s launch marks a new era in cloud security, becoming the first open platform to embed AI directly into security workflows Prowler, the leader in open cloud security, today announced the launch of ProwlerLighthouse AI, an intelligent security assistant and MCP Server, that brings autonomous AI directly into DevSecOps workflows. Available immediately, Prowler’s AI innovations... The post Prowler Launches Lighthouse AI and MCP Server first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Harnessing the power of generative AI: Druva’s multi-agent copilot for streamlined data protection
top_stories.description: Generative AI is transforming the way businesses interact with their customers and revolutionizing conversational interfaces for complex IT operations. Druva, a leading provider of data security solutions, is at the forefront of this transformation. In collaboration with Amazon Web Services (AWS), Druva is developing a cutting-edge generative AI-powered multi-agent copilot that aims to redefine the customer experience in data security and cyber resilience.
top_stories.author: David Gildea, Tom Nijs
top_stories.content: Generative AI is transforming the way businesses interact with their customers and revolutionizing conversational interfaces for complex IT operations. Druva, a leading provider of data security solutions, is at the forefront of this transformation. In collaboration with Amazon Web Services (AWS), Druva is developing a cutting-edge generative AI-powered multi-agent copilot that aims to redefine the customer experience in data security and cyber resilience.

top_stories.title: Introducing structured output for Custom Model Import in Amazon Bedrock
top_stories.description: Today, we are excited to announce the addition of structured output to Custom Model Import. Structured output constrains a model's generation process in real time so that every token it produces conforms to a schema you define. Rather than relying on prompt-engineering tricks or brittle post-processing scripts, you can now generate structured outputs directly at inference time.
top_stories.author: Manoj Selvakumar
top_stories.content: Today, we are excited to announce the addition of structured output to Custom Model Import. Structured output constrains a model's generation process in real time so that every token it produces conforms to a schema you define. Rather than relying on prompt-engineering tricks or brittle post-processing scripts, you can now generate structured outputs directly at inference time.

top_stories.title: Fighting the New York Times’ invasion of user privacy
top_stories.description: OpenAI is fighting the New York Times’ demand for 20 million private ChatGPT conversations and accelerating new security and privacy protections to protect your data.
top_stories.content: OpenAI is fighting the New York Times’ demand for 20 million private ChatGPT conversations and accelerating new security and privacy protections to protect your data.

top_stories.title: Tough new laws to strengthen the UK's defences against cyber attacks on NHS, transport and energy
top_stories.description: Proposed new laws will strengthen cyber defences for essential public services like healthcare, drinking water providers, transport and energy.
top_stories.content: Proposed new laws will strengthen cyber defences for essential public services like healthcare, drinking water providers, transport and energy.
